LeBron James was asked about the possibility of Tyronn Lue being fired as head coach of the Cavaliers following their blowout loss on Saturday against the Thunder.

“I would hope not, but really don’t know," said James. "I don’t know what’s going to happen with our team. I have no idea what conversations have been going on. I’ve been trying to stay as laser-sharp as I can to keep my guys ready to go out and play."

Lue replaced David Blatt as head coach approximately two years ago.

"We got a lot of things going on," said James. "It’s not 1. It’s 1, 2, 3, 4, 5. We got some searching to figure out how we can be better.”
